'''''Minecraft Live: 2023 (Original Soundtrack)''''' is the soundtrack released for [[Minecraft Live 2023]], featuring compositions by Camilo Forero and Joseph S. Djafar, which feature all of the music included as part of the event. The soundtrack was released individually on November 2, 2023.
